actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to preserve and promote the resources of the Connecticut River Valley.

summary.text: Provides for the preservation and promotion of the Connecticut River Valley through the establishment of a Connecticut Historic Riverway. Establishes the Mount Holyoke Riverway Committee to consult with the Secretary of the Interior on the development and administration of the valley. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to preserve and promote the resources of the Connecticut River Valley.
